about_the_game:
It is hoped that this work can ignite the passion and dreams deep within the hearts of our player friends! "The  One of Fortune" is a 2D side-scrolling plot-based turn-based game with a Chinese style. In this game, you will step into a vast and mysterious Chinese fantasy world filled with an endless variety of phenomena. Here, you are no longer a mere onlooker, but instead, you will embark on a thrilling adventure journey in your own identity, gathering the mysterious power of destiny and holding the fate of the world in your hands. You can become the revered leader of the righteous path, sweeping away the darkness with your overwhelming righteousness and saving the world; or you can transform into the powerful Demon Lord of the evil path, reversing the order of the universe with your terrifying magic power and making all living beings struggle in despair. That's right, the entire development of the storyline is under your control!

The turn-based battles are full of rhythm, and there is a unique Five Elements Overload and Break system.

On the turn-based battlefield filled with intense rhythm, you will transform into a master of strategy! You need to carefully collect various unique skills and skillfully plan the order of your moves, so as to absorb the mysterious Qi of the Five Elements.

The stage of battle continues according to the order of your moves. The states of the Dao Heart for both you and your enemies are divided into three types: Normal, Overload, and Break. You, on the other hand, must rely on your keen insight to accurately seize the right moment, resolutely consume the Qi of the Five Elements, and unleash powerful skills that can destroy the heavens and the earth.

Every release of a skill is a crucial step on your path to victory. In the thrilling battles, gradually accumulate advantages, and finally, just like a peerless master, hold high the flag of victory! Come and embark on your very own battle chapter!

The cultivation method is full of a sense of strategy, allowing you to grow from an ordinary nobody into a peerless and powerful figure.

Each cultivation round is like a crossroads of fate, and you are the protagonist who controls your own destiny!

In this world brimming with a sense of strategy, you must make difficult choices. Will you rush to the perilous battlefield to collect rare cultivation method materials and achieve a qualitative leap in your strength? Or will you delve into the mysterious ruins to search for powerful equipment materials and forge an indestructible armor for yourself? Or perhaps you'll seek in the hidden valleys to obtain the magic pills that can enhance your cultivation level?

Every choice you make will determine the unique path of the character you are cultivating. On this road full of challenges and opportunities, you will accumulate step by step and keep growing. Just like the heroic characters who make a comeback in novels, with unwavering faith and wise decisions, you will ultimately become a peerless and powerful figure admired by the world!

The plot characters are full of unique charm, and your choices will determine their fates.

A group of characters with distinct styles and unique personalities are eagerly waiting to embark on an adventure alongside you. Each of them is like a book brimming with endless stories, possessing their own exclusive characteristics, profound thoughts, and wonderful worldviews.

In this fantastical world, the personal stories of the characters are intertwined with the main narrative like threads, closely entwined with one another. Every conversation and every mission present a crossroads of fate. You will become the writer of the story, and every choice you make is like splashing ink on the canvas of destiny.

Will you lead the characters in distress onto the path of redemption, making the light of hope shine brightly again within them? Or will you use your wisdom and courage to save the characters and become a hero they look up to? Or perhaps, in the whirlpool of power, you'll rely on your strategy and strength to help the characters ascend to the throne of dominance? Of course, there are many more endings beyond your imagination waiting for you to unlock.

Here, every heartbeat is accompanied by emotional waves. Every adventure will leave a deep mark on your heart. Come and start this adventure that you are write your own legendary story!

The oriental fantasy full of mystery, explore the unknown mythical world.

The imposing dragons. The ancient ruins that once witnessed the glory and downfall of the demons and gods. The mysterious paradises hidden away. The solemn and majestic Fengshen Terrace seems to be narrating the legends of the ancient Fengshen Battle. Inside the Dragon-Locking Well, a powerful and unknown entity is sealed. The faint growls that come from within send chills down one's spine.

A great number of mysterious sects stand tall, passing down ancient and profound knowledge. A rich variety of items and equipment await those who are destined to awaken them. And there are also countless wonderful cultivation methods. Each one can lead you onto a unique path of cultivation.

Here, you will transform into a passionate and fearless protagonist, deeply experiencing the unique charm of the mysterious oriental fantasy world. Every exploration is a thrilling adventure; every discovery may rewrite your destiny. Come and join this fantastical journey and compose your own oriental legend!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain some content that is not suitable for people of all ages. There are a small number of non-explicit and ambiguous scenes in the game, such as intimate hugs and kisses between characters, as well as relatively subtle sexually suggestive dialogues. These plots are designed to enrich the storyline or the relationships between characters, but do not involve explicit pornographic images such as the direct display of sexual behaviors or the exposure of private parts.
